home.title: Full Stack Developer
home.subtitle: Building modern web experiences with .NET Core, React and React Native
home.brief: A full-stack developer passionate about building modern web experiences with .Net, React, and React Native technologies.
about.project1: Developed an ERP System using React/Electron frontend, .NET Core 8 Backend and MS SQL database
about.project2: Built an Exchange System with .NET Core 8 for currency exchange and wallet transfers
about.project3: Created a comprehensive E-Commerce Platform with React frontend, ASP.NET Core 8 Backend and MS SQL database
about.project4: Developed Mobile Applications using React Native/Expo including Trading, Budget Management and Dating apps
about.project5: Implemented complex features like real-time messaging and location services
about.education.degree: Bachelor's in Electrical and Electronics Engineering
about.education.description: Graduated in 2021 with a focus on AI and Machine Learning
about.expertise.backend: I specialize in developing backend applications using RESTful services with ASP.NET Core 8+ and managing data with MS SQL and Entity Framework Core, ensuring seamless communication between applications and databases. My technical expertise spans both web and mobile domains, delivering comprehensive digital solutions.
about.expertise.development: My development toolkit includes writing clean, testable code with xUnit unit tests while adhering to industry best practices like OOP, SOLID principles, and Design Patterns. I'm proficient in microservice architecture with hands-on experience in distributed systems using Redis and RabbitMQ.
about.expertise.frontend: Complementing my backend expertise, I've expanded my frontend capabilities to include:
about.expertise.frontendSkills.skill1: React.js for building dynamic web interfaces
about.expertise.frontendSkills.skill2: React Native with Expo for developing cross-platform mobile applications
about.expertise.fullstack: This full-stack proficiency allows me to deliver complete solutions from web APIs to native mobile experiences.
about.workflow: My development workflow emphasizes modern tools including:
about.workflow.tools.tool2: AI-powered assistants (ChatGPT/GitHub Copilot/Deepseek/Claude/Cursor etc..) for enhanced productivity
about.solutions: I've developed solutions across web and mobile domains, including:
about.webSystems.list.item1: ERP System with React/Electron frontend and .NET Core 8 Backend.
about.webSystems.list.item2: Exchange System with .Net Core 8 Backend (Exchange Currencies, Transfer Between Wallets)

about.webSystems.list.features.feature3: Product management system (CRUDs, Discount Management etc..)
about.mobileSolutions.list.item2: Personal Finance Manager with budget tracking.

projects.ecommerce-api.description: A scalable and modular E-Commerce Web API built using .NET 8 and designed with a N-Layer Architecture for efficient code organization and maintainability.
projects.ecommerce-app.description: A modern e-commerce application built with React, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS with complete shopping experience from product browsing to checkout.
projects.exchange-system.description: A feature-rich currency exchange system built using ASP.NET Core 8, implementing a modern N-tier architecture with robust authentication and authorization mechanisms.
projects.erp-system.description: A comprehensive Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) system built with React and ASP.NET Core 8.0, implementing clean architecture patterns and modern design principles.
projects.subportfolio.description: An advanced portfolio website built with modern web technologies, featuring multi-language support, theme management, and responsive design with professional UI/UX implementation.
projects.submatchsphere.description: A comprehensive mobile dating application built using React Native and Expo, featuring real-time matching, location-based discovery, and intuitive gesture controls.
projects.subgelirgider.description: A comprehensive personal finance management application that helps users manage expenses, set budgets, track savings goals, and visualize financial data. Features an intuitive interface with support for Turkish and English languages.
projects.subtakaskosesi.description: A comprehensive mobile application that facilitates peer-to-peer item swapping in Turkey. Features location-based item discovery, secure trading system, and real-time updates.
projects.takaskosesi.title: Takas Köşesi: Item Exchange Platform
projects.takaskosesi.description: A comprehensive mobile application that facilitates peer-to-peer item swapping in Turkey. Built with React Native and Expo, this platform enables users to list items they want to trade, promoting sustainability and community building through a modern, intuitive interface with real-time features.

projects.takaskosesi.features.ux.title: User Experience

projects.takaskosesi.future.list2: Push notifications for trade status updates
projects.takaskosesi.future.list4: Enhanced filtering options for item discovery
projects.ecommerce-api.features.auth.des: JWT-based authentication for secure user access with role-based authorization for user and admin functionalities
projects.ecommerce-api.features.user.des: User registration, login, profile management, and password recovery functionality
CRUD operations for managing product inventory with Redis caching for faster product retrieval and discount service of products
projects.ecommerce-api.features.order.de: Order creation, viewing, and management by users with automatic price fetching during order creation
projects.ecommerce-api.features.warehous: Control stocks of products based on warehouses and transfer stocks between warehouses
projects.ecommerce-api.features.data.des: Utilizes Entity Framework Core for database interactions with support for SQL Server
Implements caching using StackExchange.Redis and In-Memory Caching
projects.ecommerce-api.features.messagin: Integrates with RabbitMQ for message queuing
Includes xUnit for unit testing and Moq for mocking dependencies
projects.ecommerce-api.techStack: This API is built with .NET 8, using Entity Framework Core for database interactions. The application follows an N-Layer Architecture (API, Service, Repository, Core) for better maintainability and separation of concerns. Authentication is handled with JWT tokens, while caching is implemented using Redis and In-Memory caching for better performance.
projects.ecommerce-api.swagger.title: Swagger API Documentation
projects.ecommerce-api.swagger.caption: Image {current} of {total} - Swagger API Documentation
projects.ecommerce-api.implementationDet: The project is structured using a clean N-Layer Architecture for better separation of concerns:
API Layer: Exposes endpoints for client applications to interact with
Service Layer: Contains all business logic and orchestrates operations
Repository Layer: Handles data access using Entity Framework Core
Core Layer: Contains shared models and interfaces used across the application
RabbitMQ is used for message queuing and the API is fully documented with Swagger UI
projects.ecommerce-app.features.listings: Browse products by various categories with filtering and sorting options
projects.ecommerce-app.features.cart.des: Add products to cart, update quantities, and remove items easily
projects.ecommerce-app.features.checkout: Complete checkout with shipping information and payment details forms
projects.ecommerce-app.features.auth.des: Register and log in to manage your account and view order history
projects.ecommerce-app.features.responsi: Fully responsive layout that works seamlessly on desktop, tablet, and mobile devices
projects.ecommerce-app.features.theme.de: Toggle between light and dark themes for comfortable viewing
projects.ecommerce-app.techStack: This application is built with modern frontend technologies, with React and TypeScript as the foundation. Styling is handled with Tailwind CSS for a utility-first approach that speeds up development and ensures visual consistency. State management is implemented with Redux Toolkit, while API data fetching leverages React Query for optimized caching and request handling. The app is bundled with Vite for blazing fast development and production builds, and includes smooth animations powered by Framer Motion.
projects.ecommerce-app.implementationDet: The project is structured using a feature-based architecture with the following key components:
projects.ecommerce-app.implementation.co: Components: Reusable UI components like buttons, cards, navigation elements
projects.ecommerce-app.implementation.pa: Pages: Major views including home, product details, cart, and checkout
projects.ecommerce-app.implementation.ho: Hooks: Custom React hooks for common functionality across the app
projects.ecommerce-app.implementation.se: Services: API communication and data handling
projects.ecommerce-app.implementation.st: Store: Redux slices for global state management

User Authentication Page - Secure login and registration interface with form validation
Homepage with featured products and category navigation
Shopping cart and checkout process with payment options
Comprehensive endpoints for retrieving, creating, updating, and deleting exchange rates with appropriate role-based access controls
projects.exchange-system.features.wallet: Complete functionality for deposit, withdrawal, and transfers between user accounts with transaction history
projects.exchange-system.features.securi: Role-based authorization with "Admin" and "User" roles, with JWT authentication and bearer token support
projects.exchange-system.features.policy: Fine-grained authorization for sensitive operations to ensure secure transactions
projects.exchange-system.features.report: Detailed transaction history and activity logging for auditing purposes
projects.exchange-system.architecture.in: The solution follows a clean, layered architecture for maximum maintainability and scalability:
projects.exchange-system.architecture.ap: Main API project with controllers and configuration
projects.exchange-system.architecture.co: Domain models, DTOs, and interfaces for the entire application
projects.exchange-system.architecture.re: Data access layer with Entity Framework Core implementation
projects.exchange-system.architecture.se: Business logic implementation with service interfaces
projects.exchange-system.benefits.title: Architecture Benefits
projects.exchange-system.benefits.separa: Separation of concerns with distinct layers
projects.exchange-system.benefits.inject: Dependency injection for loose coupling between components
projects.exchange-system.benefits.reposi: Repository pattern for data access abstraction
projects.exchange-system.benefits.servic: Service-oriented design for encapsulated business logic
projects.exchange-system.benefits.securi: Comprehensive authorization controls for secure operations
projects.exchange-system.tech.descriptio: This API is built with ASP.NET Core 8.0, using Entity Framework Core for robust database interactions. The project leverages the repository pattern with generic interfaces for data access, providing a flexible and maintainable codebase. Security is implemented using JWT authentication with role and policy-based authorization. The API is fully documented with Swagger/OpenAPI and supports Docker containerization for easy deployment.
projects.exchange-system.controller.rate: Provides comprehensive endpoints for exchange rate management with role-based access controls:
Get specific exchange rate details (User access)
projects.exchange-system.controller.wall: Handles all financial transactions within the system:
projects.exchange-system.security.title: Security Implementation
projects.exchange-system.security.desc: Robust security features to protect sensitive financial operations:
projects.exchange-system.security.list2: Policy-based access control for sensitive operations
projects.exchange-system.security.list3: JWT authentication with Bearer token support
projects.exchange-system.security.list4: Secure API endpoints with proper authorization attributes
projects.exchange-system.security.list5: Database seeding for initial roles and admin user

projects.exchange-system.future.intro: The platform has been designed with extensibility in mind and could easily be enhanced with:
projects.exchange-system.future.list2: Historical rate analysis and trend visualization
projects.exchange-system.future.list3: Integration with external exchange rate providers
projects.exchange-system.future.list4: Mobile applications for on-the-go currency exchange
projects.exchange-system.future.list5: Automated trading strategies based on rate fluctuations

projects.portfolio.title: Portfolio Web Application
projects.portfolio.overview.title: Overview
projects.portfolio.overview.description: An advanced portfolio website built with modern web technologies that effectively showcases a developer's skills and projects with professional design and robust functionality. The site features a fully responsive design with light/dark mode support and multi-language capabilities, structured with dedicated sections for projects, skills, experience, and contact information.
projects.portfolio.techstack.description: Built with React 19 and TypeScript for robust type safety, utilizing Tailwind CSS for utility-first styling. The project implements internationalization with React Intl and manages global state through Context API. Vite provides an optimized development experience with quick builds and hot module replacement.
projects.portfolio.features.multilang.li: Fully translated content across all sections

projects.portfolio.features.theme.list1: Dark/light mode with system preference detection

projects.matchsphere.title: MatchSphere: Modern Dating App
projects.matchsphere.description: A comprehensive mobile dating application built using React Native and Expo, featuring a sleek, modern UI with intuitive swiping mechanics, real-time matching, location-based discovery, and a complete messaging system. Built with modern mobile development practices and a focus on user experience.
projects.matchsphere.techStack: Built with React Native and Expo for cross-platform compatibility, utilizing Supabase for backend services and real-time features. The app leverages React Native Reanimated for fluid animations and gestures, while Expo Router provides seamless navigation. Location services and authentication are handled through Expo's native modules.

projects.gelirgider.title: GelirGider: Personal Finance Tracker
projects.gelirgider.overview.description: GelirGider ("Income and Expenses" in Turkish) is a comprehensive personal finance management application built with React Native and Expo. The app helps users manage their expenses, set budgets, track savings goals, and visualize their financial data through an intuitive and user-friendly interface.
